actor_awards.notes: Palance won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for 'City Slickers' (1991). He won a Primetime Emmy for his performance in the 'Playhouse 90' episode 'Requiem for a Heavyweight' (1956). He received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1960.

filmography.title: City Slickers
filmography.role_description: A tough-as-nails, leather-faced trail boss who mentors a group of city folk on a cattle drive, teaching them the secret of life.
filmography.plot: Three friends facing midlife crises sign up for a fantasy cattle drive, where they bond with a gritty cowboy who changes their outlook on life.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Shane
filmography.role_description: A chillingly calm, black-clad hired gunfighter brought in to intimidate homesteaders; a role that became an archetype for western villains.
filmography.plot: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a conflict with a ruthless cattle baron forces him to act.

filmography.title: Sudden Fear
filmography.role_description: A charming but duplicitous actor who marries a wealthy playwright, only to plot her murder when he discovers she plans to cut him out of her will.
filmography.plot: A successful playwright marries an actor she rejected for a role, only to discover he and his mistress are plotting to kill her.

filmography.title: Panic in the Streets
filmography.role_description: A ruthless New Orleans gangster who unknowingly carries the pneumonic plague, becoming the target of a desperate manhunt.
filmography.plot: A doctor and a police captain have 48 hours to find a killer infected with the plague before an epidemic spreads through New Orleans.

filmography.title: Batman
filmography.role_description: The powerful and arrogant crime boss of Gotham City who is betrayed by his second-in-command, Jack Napier (who becomes the Joker).
filmography.plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

filmography.title: Contempt (Le Mépris)
filmography.role_description: An arrogant, brutish American film producer who clashes with director Fritz Lang and the screenwriter over the artistic vision of 'The Odyssey'.
filmography.plot: A screenwriter finds his marriage disintegrating while he works on a film adaptation of The Odyssey for a domineering American producer.

filmography.title: The Big Knife
filmography.role_description: A conflicted Hollywood movie star who is blackmailed by a ruthless studio mogul into signing a long-term contract he doesn't want.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood actor struggles to escape the clutches of a tyrannical studio boss who threatens to reveal a dark secret from his past.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Nominated – Golden Lion

filmography.title: Attack
filmography.role_description: A courageous but increasingly unhinged lieutenant who vows revenge on his cowardly captain for getting his men killed.
filmography.plot: A cowardly unit commander in WWII causes the deaths of his men, leading a subordinate officer to threaten to kill him if he endangers the squad again.

filmography.title: The Professionals
filmography.role_description: A charismatic Mexican revolutionary leader who has allegedly kidnapped a wealthy rancher's wife, though the truth is more complex.
filmography.plot: An American oil tycoon hires four professionals to rescue his kidnapped wife from a Mexican revolutionary across the border.

filmography.title: Young Guns
filmography.role_description: The corrupt and powerful Irish cattle baron who controls the law in Lincoln County and orders the death of Billy the Kid's mentor.
filmography.plot: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor.

filmography.title: Tango & Cash
filmography.role_description: A sinister drug lord who frames two rival LAPD detectives to get them out of his way.
filmography.plot: Two rival LAPD narcotic detectives are framed for murder by a crime boss and must work together to clear their names.

filmography.title: Barabbas
filmography.role_description: A sadistic and undefeated gladiator champion who becomes the ultimate opponent for Barabbas in the arena.
filmography.plot: The biblical criminal Barabbas, spared from crucifixion in place of Jesus, struggles with his spirituality and life as a gladiator.

filmography.title: Bagdad Cafe
filmography.role_description: An eccentric, bohemian Hollywood set painter living in a remote motel who becomes infatuated with the German tourist heroine.
filmography.plot: A lonely German woman, stranded in the Mojave Desert, transforms a run-down motel and the lives of its inhabitants.

filmography.title: Sign of the Pagan
filmography.role_description: The fierce and feared leader of the Huns who threatens to sack Rome, portrayed with both brutality and superstition.
filmography.plot: A Roman centurion is captured by Attila the Hun and escapes to warn Rome of the impending invasion.

filmography.title: Man in the Attic
filmography.role_description: A mysterious lodger in 1888 London who is suspected by his landlady of being Jack the Ripper.
filmography.plot: A mysterious pathologist rents an attic room in London during the Jack the Ripper murders, raising the suspicions of his hosts.

filmography.title: Halls of Montezuma
filmography.role_description: A tough Marine in a squad fighting to capture a Japanese-held island in the Pacific.
filmography.plot: A company of Marines races against time to find a Japanese rocket base on an island during World War II.

filmography.title: I Died a Thousand Times
filmography.role_description: An aging bank robber released from prison who wants to pull off one last heist, in this remake of 'High Sierra'.
filmography.plot: A career criminal plans to rob a resort hotel, but complications involving a crippled girl and a mongrel dog lead to his undoing.

filmography.title: The Lonely Man
filmography.role_description: A notorious gunfighter trying to retire and reconnect with his estranged son, while his past enemies hunt him down.
filmography.plot: A gunfighter trying to reform must deal with his resentful son and the vengeful outlaws who won't let him live in peace.

filmography.title: Ten Seconds to Hell
filmography.role_description: A German bomb disposal expert who engages in a deadly bet with his partner to see who can survive the longest.
filmography.plot: Two German ex-servicemen work as bomb disposal experts in post-WWII Berlin, engaging in a dangerous wager for survival.

filmography.title: Torture Garden
filmography.role_description: An Edgar Allan Poe collector in an anthology horror film who discovers a dark secret about the author.
filmography.plot: Five people visit a fairground sideshow where the mysterious Dr. Diabolo shows them their evil futures.

filmography.title: Chato's Land
filmography.role_description: A former Confederate officer who leads a posse into Apache territory to hunt a man, driven by pride and obsession.
filmography.plot: A posse of white men hunts a half-Apache man who killed a sheriff in self-defense, but the hunter becomes the hunted.

filmography.title: Oklahoma Crude
filmography.role_description: A ruthless oil company enforcer hired to intimidate a woman into giving up her wildcat oil well.
filmography.plot: A woman fights to protect her oil well from a large company with the help of her father and a drifter.

filmography.title: Alone in the Dark
filmography.role_description: A paranoid former POW and leader of a group of escaped mental patients who besiege a psychiatrist's home.
filmography.plot: Four escaped mental patients lay siege to their doctor's house during a blackout.

filmography.title: Dracula
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic yet terrifying portrayal of the vampire count, linking his bloodlust to the loss of his reincarnated love.
filmography.plot: Count Dracula travels to England to find a woman who resembles his long-lost love, leaving a trail of blood in his wake.

filmography.title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
filmography.role_description: The twin brother of Curly, a grizzled sailor who joins the protagonists on a treasure hunt.
filmography.plot: Mitch Robbins discovers a treasure map in Curly's hat and sets out with his friends and Curly's twin brother to find the gold.
